txt.en:
'The basic version of this event will require you to impress us all with your amazing strength.

'You will receive a mighty dwarf-club from me, should you choose to participate, and you may use this club to bash your fellow competitors all about the arena. If you do this enough times to impress me, I will even have a nice reward for you!'

<rgb=#FF0000>You will only need to knock players around in the basic version of the quest. Simply target a nearby player and use the item. Getting knocked out of the arena will not fail the quest, and you do not need to collect the Glorious Beer, but feel free to hit anyone going for it!</rgb>
